Name: Assail
Description: A basic attack that deals a small amount of damage to an enemy immediately in front of you.

Name: Punch
Description: A Monk's basic attack that deals a small amount of damage to an enemy immediately in front of you.

Name: Inspect
Description: Allows an aisling to study an item's attributes.

Name: nis
Description: Allows an aisling to check on Unora's current time.

Name: Kick
Description: Kicks the creature in front of you for minor damage.

Name: High Kick
Description: Kicks the creature in front of you for minor damage.

Name: Poison Punch
Description: Deals minor damage and poisons the enemy in front of you.

Name: Water Punch
Description: Hits the three tiles in front of you.

Name: Ambush
Description: Teleports you to the other side of the enemy.

Name: Earth Punch
Description: Stuns the target in front of you.

Name: Fire Punch
Description: Burns the target in front of you.

Name: Air Punch
Description: Hits two spaces in front of you.

Name: Double Punch
Description: A Monk's second basic attack that deals damage to an enemy immediately in front of you.

Name: Roundhouse Kick
Description: A strong kick that strikes your front and sides.

Name: Mantis Kick
Description: Kicks the creature in front for massive damage.

Name: Eagle Strike
Description: Deals damage to two spaces out in front of you.

Name: Throw
Description: Allows an aisling to throw an entity away from them.

Name: Claw Fist
Description: Amplifies the damage of your assails.

Name: Draco Tail Kick
Description: Deals moderate damage to surrounding enemies and sets them on fire.

Name: Tempest Kick
Description: Hits all around you.

Name: Seismic Kick
Description: Kicks the creature in front of you for massive damage and leaves target stunned.

Name: Tsunami Kick
Description: Hits four spaces in front of you.

Name: Rapid Punch
Description: A Monk's third basic attack that deals damage to an enemy immediately in front of you.

Name: Wolf Fang Fist
Description: Temporarily paralyzes the enemy in front of you.

Name: Phoenix Strike
Description: Deals damage to two spaces out in front of you.

Name: Seismic Slam
Description: Deals damage to three spaces out in front of you.

Name: Triple Punch
Description: Master Assail.

Name: Hydro Siphon
Description: Strike around you with water and siphon mana.

Name: Leverage Kick
Description: Hits all around you at a range of two, increasing damage on hostile targets.

Name: Soulful Touch
Description: Deals damage all around and heals the user based on target's current health.

Name: Dragon Strike
Description: Deals damage to three spaces out in front of you. Pure only.

Name: Cyclone Twist
Description: Damage enemies around you.

Name: Relentless Draw
Description: Pulls targets to the user.

Name: Crimson Moon
Description: Strike enemies in front of you.

Name: Chaos Fist
Description: Amplifies the damage of your assails. Pure only.

Name: Battlefield Sweep
Description: Pulls targets to the user in 6x6 range. Upgrades Relentless Draw. Pure only.

Name: Molten Strike
Description: Set your enemies ablaze around you.
